Lamex Lyrics

Song by Darksoft from Brain · 2018
If you want a lame existence
They will send you a virus or two
Lamerism is the name of the tool I use

Tailwind a feeling
Rip the sun in two
Skate on the moon
Crack in the glass won’t break unless you move
Go someplace new

So you jade out
Hangin' tuff by the pool
Slowly rowin' through a typical mood
Indigo is the color I choose
Who knew?

I wandered out into the daylight
I saved my heart so they can never pull it out

If you want it (do you want it?)
You can have all you want
When you feel it (will you see it?)
It’s just a mirage

Shrug and the system might break
Will you tempt your fate?
Hackers dressed in psychotropic blue
Combing your memory file
Not really there
Digital you
Did we think this through?

I need to get out
To free my mind
To quiet this code
And leave the app I knew behind
I wandered out
Before the ascension came
No single hive will orchestrate an overwrite

Fakin' a feeling
Mimic a truth
Bitcrushin' on the moon
Crack in the glass
Pixelated clue
Show us what’s not real

If you look away
You’ll open your eyes
